H0.text: Which Brooklyn-born author had parents named Malachy and Angela. Pete Hamill

H1.text: Which Brooklyn-born author had parents named Malachy and Angela. Jonathan Lethem

H2.text: Which Brooklyn-born author had parents named Malachy and Angela. Thomas Wolfe

H3.text: Which Brooklyn-born author had parents named Malachy and Angela. Frank Mccourt

A4.text: Frank McCourt was born in New York City's Brooklyn borough, on August 19, 1930, the eldest child of Irish Catholic immigrants Malachy Gerald McCourt, Sr. and Angela Sheehan.
